criterion.description: Name of the criterion being assessed

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.description: Evaluation of how the actual value compares to the requirement. Be detailed and specific.

main_observations.title: Main Observations
main_observations.description: Key observations extracted from the answers

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: The original document ID that was used to answer the question

document_filename.title: Document Filename
document_filename.description: The filename of the original document that was used to answer the question

pages.title: Pages
pages.description: The pages of the original document that were used to answer the question, if relevant

sections.title: Sections
sections.description: The sections of the original document that were used to answer the question, if relevant

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: Relevant quotes from the original document

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of the risk implication

content_requirements.title: Content Requirements
content_requirements.description: The content requirements for the summary.

style_guidelines.title: Style Guidelines
style_guidelines.description: The style guidelines for the summary.

best_practices_examples.title: Best Practices Examples
best_practices_examples.description: Best practices examples of a good summary

key_data_points.title: Key Data Points
key_data_points.description: List of key data points referenced in analysis

verification_methods.title: Verification Methods
verification_methods.description: Methods used to verify the data and conclusions

SupportingEvidence.title: SupportingEvidence
SupportingEvidence.description: Contains additional context and verification details

trigger_name.title: Trigger Name
trigger_name.description: Name or description of the trigger being evaluated

evidence.title: Evidence
evidence.description: List of evidence points considered for this trigger

is_triggered.title: Is Triggered
is_triggered.description: Whether the trigger condition was met

TriggerEvaluation.title: TriggerEvaluation
TriggerEvaluation.description: Represents the evaluation of a single trigger condition

series.title: Series
series.description: List of data series to plot

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the section. Must be between 1 and 200 characters.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A comprehensive summary of the section's content. Should be between 50 and 2000 characters.
examples: The company showed strong financial performance in Q4 2023, with revenue growing 15% YoY...

src__models__core__pathway__nodes__delib.title: SectionSummary
src__models__core__pathway__nodes__delib.description: Represents a summary of a specific section within a report.

company_overview.title: Company Overview
company_overview.description: A detailed overview of the company, including its business model, market position, and current status.
examples: XYZ Corp is a leading technology company specializing in cloud computing solutions...

key_metrics.title: Key Metrics
key_metrics.description: A list of 1-10 crucial quantitative and qualitative metrics highlighted in the report.

key_strengths.title: Key Strengths
key_strengths.description: A list of 1-10 major competitive advantages or positive aspects identified in the report.

key_risks.title: Key Risks
key_risks.description: A list of 1-10 significant risks or challenges faced by the company.

sections_summary.title: Sections Summary
sections_summary.description: A list of 1-20 detailed summaries for each major section of the report.

final_summary.title: Final Summary
final_summary.description: A comprehensive conclusion that synthesizes all key findings and provides an overall assessment.
examples: Based on our analysis, XYZ Corp demonstrates strong market positioning with significant growth potential...

final_summary.title: Final Summary
final_summary.description: Final summary consolidating the most important findings

final_summary.title: Final Summary
final_summary.description: Final summary consolidating the most important findings

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A factual presentation of the company's key identifying characteristics, ownership structure, and operational setup with focus on verifiable information.. Should be between 150 and 800 characters.

references.title: References
references.description: The references to the sources that were used to answer the question

inconsistencies.title: Inconsistencies
inconsistencies.description: The inconsistencies found in the answersj, if any
